description: a(0) = 0; for n>0, let MSD = Most Significant Digit and LSD = Least Significant Digit, set MSD(a(n)) = [10 - LSD(a(n-1))] mod 10 and let remaining digits of a(n) be such that a(n) is the least integer not yet present in the sequence. If LSD(a(n-1)) = 0 then the least integer not yet present in the sequence is chosen, whatever its MSD is.
